short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your Vetary Practice Dashboard to refer clients, track financing applications, edit your veterinary practice’s profile & more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vetary makes financing pet care accessible and affordable for pet owners. For veterinarians, Vetary provides a streamlined platform to drive client satisfaction and increase patient reach, empowering doctors to treat without the limitation of affordability. 

With the Vetary extension, practices can access their dashboard in one click from any window. Clicking the extension will open up a login window. Once you’re logged in, clicking the extension icon will show you a list of client application notifications. From here, clicking the arrow will take you to the dashboard home page where you can see the current status of all applications.
